0.Warm-Up: 10 minutes light cardio (e.g., jogging) followed by dynamic leg stretches.
0.Strength: 3 sets of 5 Back Squats with light weight to build foundational leg strength.
0.WOD: AMRAP 10 minutes: 5 Push-Ups, 10 Air Squats, 15 Single Unders (jump rope)

1.Warm-Up: 10 minutes rowing and mobility exercises for the back.
1.Strength: 4 sets of 6 Deadlifts focusing on form and controlled motion.
1.WOD: For Time: 3 Rounds of 10 Pull-Ups, 20 GHD Sit-Ups, 30 Double Unders (jump rope)

2.Warm-Up: 10 minutes of shoulder mobility drills and band work.
2.Strength: 5 sets of 5 Bench Press with progressive overload.
2.WOD: EMOM 12 minutes: 3 Power Cleans + 12 Push-Ups (goal: maintain consistent pacing)
